name: MacBook Computer Case with Pocket: 11 13 14 15 15.6 17 18 Inch: Black White Red Floral
description:
Protect your laptop from dust and scratches with one of my laptop sleeves. I designed these to hold your laptop safely inside a larger bag or tote. The fabrics I have chosen are fashionable & cheerful and are sure to brighten your day. The sleeves are fully lined with 100% quilt-weight cotton and interlined with fleece interfacing for stability and light padding.

The Details:
~Front pocket holds cords, files, papers, etc.
~Velcro tab closure
~Pattern placement & thread color could vary, but rest assured that what you receive will be beautiful!
______
HOW TO CHOOSE THE CORRECT SIZE:
First, measure your laptop’s length, width & thickness. Check the chart in the last two photos for measuring & sizing guidelines, then choose the largest size that corresponds with either your length+thickness or width+thickness measurement.

For Example: If your length+thickness measurement corresponds with a 15” laptop sleeve, but your width+thickness measurement corresponds with a 14” laptop sleeve, you would want to choose the 15” sleeve.

IMPORTANT: Note that not all laptops have the same dimensions even if their screen size is the same. Please order carefully, and if you have any sizing questions please contact me with your laptop’s dimensions and I will be glad to help you! 

Size Chart: (If you have any doubt about sizing, please contact me. I cannot be responsible if the wrong size is chosen.)
11 Inch - Measures 13" x 8.5" (MacBook Air 11)
13 Inch - Measures 14" x 10" (MacBook Air 13 & MacBook Pro 13)
14 Inch - Measures 15.5" x 10.25"
15 Inch - Measures 16" x 10.75" (MacBook Pro 15)
15.6 Inch - Measures 16.75" x 11.25"
17 Inch - Measures 18.25" x 12"
18 Inch - Measures 20" x 14"

Please allow 3-5 days for your items to be made and shipped. 
 ________ 
 Why shop with Forshee Designs? 
~I do business the way I would want business done with me! 
~I am quick to respond to messages. Email me anytime at april@forsheedesigns.com  
~My items are unique and sewn by me in my home studio using the best quality materials.

name: Padded Camera Strap Cover: Hexagons
description:
These fun padded camera strap covers are a great solution to the uncomfortable camera straps that come with dSLR and SLR cameras. Just slip one over your existing strap and you're ready to go in comfort and style! Each strap is made & lined with high quality 100% cotton fabric and thick fleece interfacing on the inside for padding.

The straps are made to fit the vast majority of existing camera straps. Please measure your strap before ordering! If additional length or width is needed, just ask! I will be happy to accommodate the size you need.

The Details: 
~Approximately 25” x 2.25” 
~Materials include cotton fabric, and thick fleece interfacing 
~Machine wash, hang to dry, warm iron if desired 
~Pattern placement and thread color may vary but rest assured that what you receive will be beautiful!

Personalization is available! Just use the drop down menu to select. Font gallery can be seen here: http://www.flickr.com/photos/b10ndie24/sets/72157624527739121/

name: MacBook Computer Case with Pocket: 11 13 14 15 15.6 17 18 Inch: Floral Fling
description:
Protect your laptop from dust and scratches with one of my laptop sleeves. I designed these to hold your laptop safely inside a larger bag or tote. The fabrics I have chosen are fashionable & cheerful and are sure to brighten your day. The sleeves are fully lined with 100% quilt-weight cotton and interlined with fleece interfacing for stability and light padding.

The Details: 
~Front pocket holds cords, files, papers, etc. 
~Velcro tab closure 
~Pattern placement & thread color could vary, but rest assured that what you receive will be beautiful! 
______ 
HOW TO CHOOSE THE CORRECT SIZE: 
First, measure your laptop’s length, width & thickness. Check the chart in the last two photos for measuring & sizing guidelines, then choose the largest size that corresponds with either your length+thickness or width+thickness measurement.

For Example: If your length+thickness measurement corresponds with a 15” laptop sleeve, but your width+thickness measurement corresponds with a 14” laptop sleeve, you would want to choose the 15” sleeve.

IMPORTANT: Note that not all laptops have the same dimensions even if their screen size is the same. Please order carefully, and if you have any sizing questions please contact me with your laptop’s dimensions and I will be glad to help you!

Size Chart: (If you have any doubt about sizing, please contact me. I cannot be responsible if the wrong size is chosen.) 
11 Inch - Measures 13" x 8.5" (MacBook Air 11) 
13 Inch - Measures 14" x 10" (MacBook Air 13 & MacBook Pro 13) 
14 Inch - Measures 15.5" x 10.25" 
15 Inch - Measures 16" x 10.75" (MacBook Pro 15) 
15.6 Inch - Measures 16.75" x 11.25" 
17 Inch - Measures 18.25" x 12" 
18 Inch - Measures 20" x 14"

name: Extra Large Laundry Bag for Dorm and Travel : Tie Dye Purple Chevron
description:
Dirty laundry bags are here!

Well, the bags themselves aren't dirty, but you can avoid putting your dirty laundry in the floor or back inside your suitcase when traveling. At the end of your trip, you're ready to go! Just tie up the drawstring and throw in the car, or put the bag (with dirty clothes inside) back in your suitcase.

For dorm life, keeping your room tidy and organized is key if you're going to live through your college years (so your roommate doesn't kill you, you know!). Just throw your dirty laundry inside and head over to the washers & dryers!

You can also use this bag at home for easy transportation of your dry cleaning!

Details: 
~Holds 5-6 days worth of clothes. 
~100% cotton canvas 
~Machine wash cold, dry on low 
~Approx. 22" x 27"

name: MacBook Laptop Sleeve with Pocket: 11 13 14 15 15.6 17 18 Inch: Groovy
description:
Protect your laptop from dust and scratches with one of my laptop sleeves. I designed these to hold your laptop safely inside a larger bag or tote. The fabrics I have chosen are fashionable & cheerful and are sure to brighten your day. The sleeves are fully lined with 100% quilt-weight cotton and interlined with fleece interfacing for stability and light padding.

The Details: 
~Front pocket holds cords, files, papers, etc. 
~Velcro tab closure 
~Pattern placement & thread color could vary, but rest assured that what you receive will be beautiful! 
______ 
HOW TO CHOOSE THE CORRECT SIZE: 
First, measure your laptop’s length, width & thickness. Check the chart in the last two photos for measuring & sizing guidelines, then choose the largest size that corresponds with either your length+thickness or width+thickness measurement.

For Example: If your length+thickness measurement corresponds with a 15” laptop sleeve, but your width+thickness measurement corresponds with a 14” laptop sleeve, you would want to choose the 15” sleeve.

IMPORTANT: Note that not all laptops have the same dimensions even if their screen size is the same. Please order carefully, and if you have any sizing questions please contact me with your laptop’s dimensions and I will be glad to help you!

Size Chart: (If you have any doubt about sizing, please contact me. I cannot be responsible if the wrong size is chosen.) 
11 Inch - Measures 13" x 8.5" (MacBook Air 11) 
13 Inch - Measures 14" x 10" (MacBook Air 13 & MacBook Pro 13) 
14 Inch - Measures 15.5" x 10.25" 
15 Inch - Measures 16" x 10.75" (MacBook Pro 15) 
15.6 Inch - Measures 16.75" x 11.25" 
17 Inch - Measures 18.25" x 12" 
18 Inch - Measures 20" x 14"

Please allow 3-5 days for your items to be made and shipped. 
 ________ 
UPGRADES: Double padding, monogramming and shipping upgrades can be found by clicking on the "Upgrades" section above.

name: Padded Camera Strap Cover with Lens Cap Pocket : Black and White Hexagons
description:
These fun padded camera strap covers are a great solution to the uncomfortable camera straps that come with dSLR cameras. Just slip one over your existing strap and you're ready to go in comfort and style! Each strap is made & lined with high quality 100% cotton fabric with fleece interfacing on the inside for padding.

I designed these camera strap covers to fit around the camera strap to prevent sliding so that the cover and the strap become one. I added an expandable lens cap pocket that fits caps up to 72mm! 

The Details:
~Approximately 24” x 2.25”
~Fully lined
~100% soft cotton designer fabric
~Interlined with fleece interfacing for padding
~Machine wash, hang to dry, warm iron if desired
~Pattern placement and thread color may vary but rest assured that what you receive will be beautiful!
~First photos show the fabric you will receive. Last photo is a close-up example of lens cap pocket.

Please allow 3-5 days for your items to be made and shipped.

description:

The fabrics I have chosen are fashionable & cheerful and are sure to brighten your day. The sleeves are fully lined with 100% quilt-weight cotton and interlined with fleece interfacing for stability and light padding.

The Details:
~Front pocket holds cords, files, papers, etc.
~Velcro tab closure
~Pattern placement & thread color could vary, but rest assured that what you receive will be beautiful!
______
HOW TO CHOOSE THE CORRECT SIZE:
First, measure your laptop’s length, width & thickness. Check the chart in the last two photos for measuring & sizing guidelines, then choose the largest size that corresponds with either your length+thickness or width+thickness measurement.

For Example: If your length+thickness measurement corresponds with a 15” laptop sleeve, but your width+thickness measurement corresponds with a 14” laptop sleeve, you would want to choose the 15” sleeve.

IMPORTANT: Note that not all laptops have the same dimensions even if their screen size is the same. Please order carefully, and if you have any sizing questions please contact me with your laptop’s dimensions and I will be glad to help you! 

Size Chart: (If you have any doubt about sizing, please contact me. I cannot be responsible if the wrong size is chosen.)
11 Inch - Measures 13" x 8.5" (MacBook Air 11)
13 Inch - Measures 14" x 10" (MacBook Air 13 & MacBook Pro 13)
14 Inch - Measures 15.5" x 10.25"
15 Inch - Measures 16" x 10.75" (MacBook Pro 15)
15.6 Inch - Measures 16.75" x 11.25"
17 Inch - Measures 18.25" x 12"
18 Inch - Measures 20" x 14"

name: Personalized Minky Stroller Blanket -- Gray & Pink Flower Shower
description:
The creamy softness of minky fleece paired with a designer print is simply irresistible to the touch. It's the PERFECT baby shower gift! Everyone will be raving about its beauty and softness! It's not only cute but also useful.  At a medium weight, this blanket can be used year 'round. 

USES:
~Play mat
~Tummy time mat
~Changing pad
~Car seat canopy
~Stroller blanket

CONSTRUCTION:
~Rounded corners 
~Triple stitched inside and topstitched for durability and strength
~Cotton fabric is preshrunk

SIZE:
~30” x 35”, a convenient size for babies & toddlers

MATERIALS:
~100% cotton designer fabric paired with soft, luxurious 100% polyester minky fleece
~Minky fleece will not pill up like regular fleece

CARE:
~Machine wash warm, tumble dry low, do not iron minky

The fabrics I have chosen are fashionable & cheerful and are sure to brighten your day. HOW TO CHOOSE THE CORRECT SIZE:
First, measure your laptop’s length, width & thickness. Check the chart in the last two photos for measuring & sizing guidelines, then choose the largest size that corresponds with either your length+thickness or width+thickness measurement.

For Example: If your length+thickness measurement corresponds with a 15” laptop sleeve, but your width+thickness measurement corresponds with a 14” laptop sleeve, you would want to choose the 15” sleeve.

IMPORTANT: Note that not all laptops have the same dimensions even if their screen size is the same. Please order carefully, and if you have any sizing questions please contact me with your laptop’s dimensions and I will be glad to help you!

name: PDF Sewing Pattern--Coupon File Clutch--Email Delivery
description:
You can stitch up your very own coupon file clutch with this sewing pattern! I've even included a template for 4"x6" tabbed dividers so you can print them on card stock to use inside your clutch!

The pattern includes written instructions along with dozens of photos & diagrams depicting the steps.  It is in PDF format and will be emailed to you within 24 hours of cleared payment!
______ 
Save money in style with a handy coupon clutch!

I designed this coupon clutch to fit 4" x 6" tabbed index cards snugly at the bottom. I added extra room at the top, allowing for ease of filing through coupons and the ability to fill up with lots of money-saving coupons!

Details: 
~Dimensions: 2” deep, 5.5” tall, 6” wide at the bottom, 9” wide at the top 
~Velcro Closure 
~Fully lined 
_____
Supplies Needed: 
1/4 Yard Quilt-Weight Fabric for Exterior
1/4 Yard Quilt-Weight Coordinating Fabric for Interior
1/4 Yard Fusible Fleece Interfacing
6” of 3/4” Sew On Hook and Loop Tape
Coordinating Thread
Fabric Shears
Marking Chalk or Water-Soluble Fabric Pen
Pins
Iron
Measuring Tape or Ruler

Helpful Supplies: 
Rotary Cutter & Self-Healing Mat

description:
These fun padded camera strap covers are a great solution to the uncomfortable camera straps that come with dSLR and SLR cameras. Just slip one over your existing strap and you're ready to go in comfort and style! Each strap is made & lined with high quality 100% cotton fabric and thick fleece interfacing on the inside for padding.

The straps are made to fit the vast majority of existing camera straps. Please measure your strap before ordering! If additional length or width is needed, just ask! I will be happy to accommodate the size you need.

~Approximately 25” x 2.25” 
~Materials include cotton fabric, and thick fleece interfacing

name: PDF Sewing Pattern--Padded Laptop Sleeve with Pocket--Email Delivery
description:
You can stitch up your very own custom-sized padded laptop sleeve with this sewing pattern! 

The pattern gives instructions to make any size laptop sleeve and includes written instructions along with dozens of photos & diagrams depicting the steps. Includes instructions for French seams! It is in PDF format and will be emailed to you within 24 hours of your cleared payment.
______
Protect your laptop from dust and scratches with one of my laptop sleeves! I designed these to hold your laptop safely inside a larger bag or tote. The sleeves are fully lined with 100% quilt-weight cotton and interlined with thick fleece interfacing for stability and padding.

The Details:
~Front pocket holds cords, files, papers, etc.
~Velcro tab closure
~Materials include cotton fabric, thick fleece interfacing, hook & loop tape.
~Machine wash cold/gentle, lay flat to dry.

Supplies Needed:
3/8 to 1/2 yard of 44" wide focus fabric
3/8 to 1/2 yard of 44" wide coordinating fabric
3/4 yard of 44" wide fabric for lining
3/4 yard of 40" fusible fleece interfacing
A 1.5" piece of 1" wide hook & loop tape
Coordinating thread

Helpful Supplies:
Rotary Cutter & Self-Healing Mat
